About.paragraph: According to the National Institute on Deafness and Other Communication Disorders, 15% of American adults (37.5 million) report some trouble hearing, yet only 1 in 5 people that would benefit from a hearing aid use one. Sound Sustainabilityâ€™s online hearing screening removes barriers preventing people from determining whether they have hearing loss. To do this, we worked with audiologists to produce a free, easy-to-use, hearing screening that has users listen and respond to a series of tones played at different frequencies and decibels. Our goal is to allow people concerned for their hearing health to quickly check their hearing within the comfort of their own homes.
Why: Ability to screen from the comfort of your own home
No need to provide any personal identifying information
Completely free screening at no cost to user
Simple design that clearly lays out screening process
User may create account to save results to track over time

Testimonials.user: Anyone Looking Into Over The Counter Hearing Aids
Testimonials.text: Sound Sustainability's mission is to provide affordable OTC hearing aids. Currently in development, this solution aims to provide results that indicate the best fit of hearing aid for you.

Many people with lower hearing health have no idea, and on average will go 7 years without any form of diagnosis! The environments we are often in is the one of the main contributing factors to our hearing health.

You may already be wondering if you or a loved one is experiencing lower levels of hearing. The first step to your hearing health journey begins with a screening. By taking one online, you can start from anywhere!

Overview.title: 1. Set Up
Overview.text: Find a quiet, comfortable environment and your favorite pair of headphones.

Overview.title: 2. Calibrate
Overview.text: Select the type of headphones you are using and adjust your device's volume to 50%.

Overview.title: 3. Listen
Overview.text: You will hear a series of tones and identify which tones you're hearing.

Overview.title: 4. Discover
Overview.text: Get instant results and personalized guidance on the next steps in your hearing journey.
